actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to furnish free transportation to certain U.S. citizens desiring to establish permanent residence in a foreign country.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of State to furnish free transportation to United States citizens desiring to establish permanent residence in a foreign country. Requires such citizens to relinquish their right to reenter the United States for a period of sixty-five years from the date of their departure from the United States.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to furnish free transportation to certain U.S. citizens desiring to establish permanent residence in a foreign country.
